lead_paragraph: Teams progressing to the latter stages of the FA Cup next season will be allowed to field a fourth substitute in extra time, the English Football Association (FA) announced on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: FA Cup to Allow Fourth Substitute in Extra Time
headline.main: FA Cup to Allow Fourth Substitute in Extra Time
